Articles.Content:
About time I released this, been in the workshop since 1.0 came out.

It can jump even on Kerbin gravity, but very hard to control.

Download if someone wants it.

[![screenshot1385_zpsb1eg88mr.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1385_zpsb1eg88mr.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1385_zpsb1eg88mr.png.html)

[![screenshot1391_zpsnlyjjfyg.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1391_zpsnlyjjfyg.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1391_zpsnlyjjfyg.png.html)

[![screenshot1389_zps5kgb3kjg.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1389_zps5kgb3kjg.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1389_zps5kgb3kjg.png.html)

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) that looks awesome. And very big. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Thanks! Yeah, it's built around a Jumbo-64.
